items.title: LEGO Pokémon Range Revealed: Pikachu, Eevee, And A 6,800-Piece Beast

items.title: Amazon On The Future For $50 AI Wearable That Listens To Conversations
items.description: You won't find it on Amazon's store just yet, but it sounds like the tech giant has big plans for subsidiary Bee's $50 listening AI band.

items.title: 2026 Mixture Of Experts (MoE) Models And The Consell De Cent

items.title: Apple’s Exclusive Google Deal Is Bad News For Samsung
items.description: Apple's AI deal with Google brings Gemini to iPhone — and gives Samsung a serious problem.
